title: Tutorial
body:
Hello! Press "z" to go to the next dialogue line and/or to choose an option.
Press "x" to make text scroll faster.
Use the arrow keys to move around.
Use the "Up" and "Down" arrow keys to browse through the options.
Press "e" to interact with appliances and customers!
Good luck!

title: Customer1
body:
One coffee please!

[[ (Give coffee) |Give_Coffee1]]
[[ Sure thing! |thanks1]]

title: Make_Drinks
body:
Would you like to make a drink?

[[ Yes |Drink_Choices]]
[[ No |No]]

title: Make_Pastries
body:
Would you like to make a pastry?

[[ Yes |Pastry_Choices]]
[[ No |No]]

title: Customer3
body:
Hi!
Just a coffee for me!

[[ (Give coffee) |Give_Coffee3]]
[[ Sure thing! |thanks3]]

title: Customer2
body:
Hi!
I would like a cake please!

[[ (Give cake) |Give_Cake2]]
[[ Sure thing! |thanks2]]

title: Cake
body:
You made cake!  +1 cake

Press "z" to exit.

<<Cake>>

title: Pastry_Choices
body:
What pastry would you like to make?

[[ Cake |Cake]]

[[ Never mind |No]]

title: Coffee
body:
You made coffee!    +1 coffee

Press "z" to exit.

<<Coffee>>

title: Drink_Choices
body:
What drink would you like to make?

[[ Coffee |Coffee]]

[[ Never mind |No]]

title: Give_Cake2
body:
<<if $cake > 0>> 
Thank you for the cake! <<removeCake>>
<<else>>
It seems like you didn't bring any cake with you.
<<endif>>

title: thanks3
body: Once you make it, please bring it to me! Thank you!

body: Once you make it, please bring it to me! Thank you!

title: Give_Coffee1
body:
